headline: Hackers Went to Work as Trump Inquiry Began
abstract: The timing and scale of the attacks suggest the Russians may be looking for the same kind of damaging information on Joe Biden that President Trump wanted from Ukraine, security experts say.
lead_paragraph: With President Trump facing an impeachment trial over his efforts to pressure Ukraine to investigate former Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and his son Hunter Biden, Russian military hackers have been boring into the Ukrainian gas company at the center of the affair, according to security experts.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates
